column4: for a first time ubuntu user, what softwares should i install first?

the only way to learn linux is to read :P
where should i go to get reading resources?
read some command line cheat sheets and read wiki articles adn man pages
or should i just google it

to learn more about a program in linux you can type "man <program>" and you'll get the manual on it. try doing "man cd"
to exit out of the manual you hit the q key
